-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(co(c4, c2, cv(s0)), c3))

|- wcel(c0, cgrp)

-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

-| diffsc(s2, c0)

-| diffsc(s2, c2)
-| diffsc(s2, c3)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))
-| wcel(c3, c1)

comment: Properties that determine a group. ` N ` (negative) is normally dependent on ` x ` i.e. read it as ` N ( x ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 3-Sep-2011.)
